    • Method Detail

      • setCyclist

        public void setCyclist(Fort cyclist)
        Sets the value of the default Cyclist, whose identity will be attached via #$myCreator bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session. Setting the current Cyclist (via #setCurrentCyclist) will override the default cyclist within that thread.
        Specified by:
        setCyclist in interface CycAccessOptions
        Parameters:
        cyclist - the cyclist term

      • setCyclistName

        public void setCyclistName(String cyclistName)
                    throws com.cyc.session.exception.SessionCommunicationException,
                           com.cyc.session.exception.SessionConfigurationException
        Sets the value of the default Cyclist for this CycClient, whose identity will be attached via #$myCreator bookkeeping assertions to new KB entities created in this session. Setting the current Cyclist (via #setCurrentCyclist will override this default Cyclist within that thread.
        Specified by:
        setCyclistName in interface com.cyc.session.SessionOptions
        Parameters:
        cyclistName - the name of the default cyclist term
        Throws:
        com.cyc.session.exception.SessionCommunicationException - if a communications error occurs or the Cyc server cannot be found.
        com.cyc.session.exception.SessionConfigurationException - if the cyclist cannot be set.

      • resetCyclist

        public void resetCyclist()
        Resets the current cyclist value. If the current CycSessionConfiguration has a default Cyclist, that cyclist will now become the current cyclist.
        Specified by:
        resetCyclist in interface com.cyc.session.SessionOptions

      • getCyclist

        public Fort getCyclist()
        Returns the value of the Cyclist. Returns the value from #setCurrentCyclist(com.cyc.base.cycobject.Fort) if one has been set. Otherwise, returns the default as set with setCyclist(com.cyc.base.cycobject.Fort). If that also has not been set, return null.
        Specified by:
        getCyclist in interface CycAccessOptions
        Returns:
        the value of the default Cyclist

        Specified by:
